display_long_description:
X8 is a **Free to Play** 5v5 VR multiplayer hero shooter where heroes from different shooting game worlds battle in order to stop an **omnipotent AI** and restore a path back to their worlds. Are you up to the challenge?

[media]

FORCE MULTIPLY!
Synergize your gunplay with versatile hero abilities to gain the competitive edge.

[media]

MASTER DEMOLITION MODE!
Take turns to Attack and Defend by planting or defusing the Syphon across maps designed to test your creative strategies.

[media]

The arena is set. Fighting is the only way out.
